showerReviews.reviewText: … ! I really loved it! I would rent it for a family gathering! My best friend's daughter and her boyfriend's baby shower was there. It was lovely and comfortable for the guest to have spacious seating. The workers were nice as well! We …

showerReviews.reviewText: I used the spinning studio and took a shower at the Y today. The facility was clean, and many of the exercise machines and other equipment were in use. The cycling studio has 16 modern spinning bikes. All but one was in use during two …

… seen older gentlemen alone in the family changing room on two different occasions. They had no family with them and were trying to shower next to my daughters. I don't reccomend using the family bathroom if your a paranoid mama bear like …

… filled up. The steam room is absolutely horrible it's like sitting in some South American jungle. It's not steamy just a little bit like sitting in a cloud. The men's locker room where one would shower smells distinctly of mold and mildew!
… My last stop is the steam room so I can relax before my shower. …

… stop going to thurs night belly dance class for the same reason. Once the weather cools off the woman's locker room is too cold to take a shower and I stop using the hot tub and working out in the pool because the locker room is so cold. …
Friendly staff, when they have them. Great swimming for the family. Towels are hard to come by early mornings. So many bugs in the men’s shower it’s gross.
They have the nicest people there and their facilities are nice and clean. The only issue I have is how disgusting the shower floors are though

the insect problem knats in the women showers really need to stop this isnt outdoor showers,no other ymca facility has this kind of problem and it is nasty to shower with bugs especially in an indoor facility.
